sys_hub_flow_snapshot.description: 1, The flow as part of the NeedIt application. 2, Run the flow weekly on Fridays at 11 pm. 3, Get the value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be to automatically close it. 4, Use the Get Days Ago Date action to calculate the overdue date to compare against due dates. 5, Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the property. 6, Update each overdue NeedIt Task. - Set the State to Closed Incomplete. - Update the Work notes to state that the Record was closed because it was too far past the due date. 7, Write a message to the log to state that the NeedIt Task record was automatically closed. Be sure to include the NeedIt Task number in the log. 8, Save and test the flow. 9, View the NeedIt Task records and the System Log to verify results.
